thread.section_title: SecureDataRecovery.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecureDataRecovery.ca | securedatarecovery.ca
thread.title: Rick Wilson

author: Rick Wilson
title: Rick Wilson
text: Sent a request for help submission via their website and within minutes of sending it Alec Sakenes called me to talk about the problem I was having with my Seagate Go Flex Free Agent. I decided to use Secure Data Recovery because of Alec's assurance that they could recover my lost data. Alec was right, they were able to recover my lost data and I couldn't be happier. Alec was very professional and kept in touch with me through the whole process. Thanks again Alec!
